submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumSum(self, grid: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        R = len(grid)
        C = len(grid[0])
        
        def solve1(r1, c1, r2, c2):           
            assert r1 <= r2
            assert c1 <= c2 
            
            maxR = max((r for r in range(r1, r2 + 1) for c in range(c1, c2 + 1) if grid[r][c]), default=inf)
            minR = min((r for r in range(r1, r2 + 1) for c in range(c1, c2 + 1) if grid[r][c]), default=-inf)
            minC = min((c for r in range(r1, r2 + 1) for c in range(c1, c2 + 1) if grid[r][c]), default=-inf)
            maxC = max((c for r in range(r1, r2 + 1) for c in range(c1, c2 + 1) if grid[r][c]), default=inf)
            return (maxR - minR + 1) * (maxC -  minC + 1)
        def solve2(r1, c1, r2, c2, which):
            assert r1 <= r2
            assert c1 <= c2
            ret = inf
            for r in range(r1, r2):
                ret = min(ret, 
                          solve1(r1, c1, r, c2) +
                          solve1(r + 1, c1, r2, c2)
                         )
            for c in range(c1, c2):
                ret = min(ret, 
                          solve1(r1, c1, r2, c) +
                          solve1(r1, c + 1, r2, c2)
                         )
                
            return ret
            
        
        ret = inf
        r1 = 0
        r2 = R - 1
        c1 = 0
        c2 = C - 1
        for r in range(R - 1):
            ret = min(ret, 
                      solve2(r1, c1, r, c2, 0) +
                      solve1(r + 1, c1, r2, c2), 
                      solve1(r1, c1, r, c2) +
                      solve2(r + 1, c1, r2, c2, 0)
                     )
        for c in range(C - 1):
            ret = min(ret, 
                      solve2(r1, c1, r2, c, 1) +
                      solve1(r1, c + 1, r2, c2), 
                      solve1(r1, c1, r2, c) +
                      solve2(r1, c + 1, r2, c2, 1)
                     )

        return ret
